Hey guys!! =D
I'm literally not foolin, i got the English language to appear in the game! =D

Okay so I will tell you how to do it =)
Step 1) Go to this site, and download the torrent for the English pack. I know it say's it's for Windows, but trust me, it works =)

http://gigabytezone.com/load/games/pc/far_cry_3_english_language_pack/2-1-0-1528

Step 2) Right Click Far Cry 3 App, Show Package Contents > Drive_C > Program Files > Ubisoft > Far Cry 3 > Data_win32

Step 3) Go into the Data_win32 folder on the English Language Pack and place the "sound_english.fat into the Data_win32 folder of the Far Cry 3 folder and then delete "sound_russian.fat" file, and the "sound_russian.dat" file.

Step 4) Go into the "worlds" folder on both the Far Cry 3 game, and the English Pack. Then go into the "fc3_main" folder for both.

Step 5) Delete both the "fc3_main_russian.fat" and "fc3_main_russian.dat" files on the Far Cry 3 game. Then place the english files from the Language Pack into the folder.

Step 6) Hit back into the "worlds" folder on both, then go into the "multicommon" folder, and repeat step 5.

And then that's it =D

If you have any questions, then just ask.
Follow @thortin's method to get the menu's in English as well.

You're welcome =)

And oh yea, to make sure the English pack is in the game.
Start up the game, and go into "options" then select the "audio" option and see if the language says English.

guys i know how to change the language(very easy)
first make sure that you have the game in your applications folder. After that you right click on the game, and then go to 
contents/info.plst and open the file.
After you have opened the file you have to find this:
-language=russian
after you have found it take the russian word away and put the language you want, i have it in english
For me it does look out like that.
-language=english
If you see the english word take it away and put your language
Sorry for the bad english,sorry

from -language=russian
to     -language=languageyouwant

_Cakeman: Like every other game you have to COPY it to the harddrive (preferably the applications-folder) before you can play it.
You are trying to open the game from a disk-image which you dont have permission to write on (you cant make ANY changes in it) which the system also told you.
Copy and play - that is if it works for you, i got it started (with the english language pack and english menus) but there is no voice (except in the intro-movie) and it keeps on crashing within 1-2 minutes from you start level 1...
